resources.string: Ghost is an epic word game of strategy and lexicographical knowledge.

Players take turns adding letters to the end of a word fragment. Unlike typical word games, the goal is to NOT finish a word greater than 3 letters in length. As with the basketball shooting games of "HORSE" and "PIG," players are assigned letters of the word "GHOST" if they complete a word. When a player earns the word "GHOST," they are eliminated from the game. The last player remaining wins!

A player has the option to challenge the previous player if they think that the previous player is bluffing. When a player is challenged, they must be able to create a word using the current word fragment. If the player fails to create a word, they receive a letter, but if the player is able to create a word, the player who challenged them receives a letter.
